explanation: [0-0] A man sits in front of a black background, wearing a red T-shirt and black pants. He wears black headphones and holds drumsticks in his hands. In front of the man is a purple table with a black beverage bottle, a glass with a straw, and a white cloth on the left. There is also a stand with a microphone attached to it on the table. Next to the table are several musical instruments and part of a laptop. In the upper part of the frame, a hand holds a green vegetable over the table.

[0-3] The man taps the drumsticks on the table and grabs the white cloth on the table with his left hand. In the upper part of the frame, a hand is chopping a chili pepper on a cutting board. Then the man puts the drumstick in his left hand on the table and rubs it against the other drumstick in his right hand.

Then the man puts the drumstick in his left hand on the table and rubs it against the other drumstick in his right hand.

Then the man puts the drumstick in his left hand on the table and rubs it against the other drumstick in his right hand.

[3-10] Then, the man blows forward, then touches the musical instrument in front of him, picks up a piece of green foam and pinches it a few times. Then, he rubs the black bottle with his hand, rubs the drumsticks together, and blows forward. In the upper part of the frame, one hand throws a handful of chili peppers away and puts the green vegetables in the pot, then flips the pot a few times, and pours in some brown liquid. One hand uses a spoon to stir-fry the food in the pot.
